EmailTemplate.name: FVFCampaignUploadResult
EmailTemplate.subject: Successful Upload of Nominated Items
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Owner} ,
All Nominated Items for the FVF Campaign have been uploaded.
In total, {!countItem} listings for {!countFVF} sellers were uploaded.
Objects Success Failed Comments
FVF(listing level) -promo on seller level
{!fvfOK} {!fvfKO} {!fvfError} Related Listings {!itemOK} {!itemKO} {!itemError}
Best,
HIVE team
